item.description:
"A/V Geeks"  is the brainchild of, among others, Skip Elsheimer who will be screening classic A/V from the past on an irregular basis at Real Art Ways.  Each event has a theme and they select from over 23,000 films in their archives.

 

For more info about A/V Geeks, check out their website:  http://www.avgeeks.com/

For information about the event, go to:  http://www.realartways.org/livearts.htm#av

 

Regular movies at RAW start at 7:30pm, but this is a special event and starts at 8:00pm.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "A/V Geeks: The Celluloid Salesman" @ RAW
